alternative_message: Always define an else in case statement.
Use proper naming conventions for your class.
Use a logger instead of puts or add assertion.
Rename your module to fit the naming convention.
Use enumerable methods instead of for loop.
Replace instance variable by parameter in partial
Set variables in place of referencing params in view
Set variables in place of referencing session in view
Check the return value of save, otherwise use save!
Use the new Ruby 1.9+ hash syntax
Favor modifier if/unless usage when you have a single-line body. Another good alternative is the usage of control flow &&/||
Don't use parentheses around the condition of an if/unless/while/until
We ignored double quote rule for this review
We ignored hash syntax rule for this review
Your branch must be test infected.
Add a test for the following class
Add a test for the following method
Add documentation to the following method
Add documentation to the following class
